name: Celestial Creator
description: 3D luxurious builder and shooter game. Construct and build very quickly and intuitively with highest looks and top appearance exteriors brilliant and outstanding materials, objects, shapes, buildings, levels, maps, worlds and protect them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 2.66GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 630 PCI-E 2.0 with 2GB DDR3/128bit Storage: 7.4 GB available space Sound Card: Normal
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-i7 3GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 5xx/7xx/9xx/1xxx with 2GB Storage: 7.4 MB available space Sound Card: Normal
